summary.content: My wife, daughter and I were all sitting at the kitchen table eating waffles for breakfast this morning, when this humorous exchange involving my 2-year-old took place: Wife, smiling at daughter: “This is a really fun age, isn’t it?” Ryan, chewing: “Mhmmm…” *short pause* Daughter, defiantly: “NO IT’S NOT!” Ryan, losing it: *muffled snicker*

content.html:
My wife, daughter and I were all sitting at the kitchen table eating waffles for breakfast this morning, when this humorous exchange involving my 2-year-old took place:

Wife, smiling at daughter: “This is a really fun age, isn’t it?”

Ryan, chewing: “Mhmmm…”

*short pause*

Daughter, defiantly: “NO IT’S NOT!”

Ryan, losing it: *muffled snicker*
content.plain:
My wife, daughter and I were all sitting at the kitchen table eating waffles for breakfast this morning, when this humorous exchange involving my 2-year-old took place:
 Wife, smiling at daughter: “This is a really fun age, isn’t it?”
Ryan, chewing: “Mhmmm…”
*short pause*
Daughter, defiantly: “NO IT’S NOT!”
Ryan, losing it: *muffled snicker*
content.source:
My wife, daughter and I were all sitting at the kitchen table eating waffles for breakfast this morning, when this humorous exchange involving my *2-year-old* took place:

> **Wife**, smiling at daughter: “This is a really fun age, isn’t it?”
>
> **Ryan**, chewing: “Mhmmm…”
>
> \*short pause\*
>
> **Daughter**, defiantly: *“NO IT’S NOT!”*
>
> **Ryan**, losing it: \*muffled snicker\*
